item.title: Clifton Hypnotherapy Practice
item.description:
Clifton Hypnotherapy Practice

Here at the Clifton Hypnotherapy Practice in Bristol we specialise in helping people empower themselves not only to get over their issues, but to go on to be the best they can be.

item.title: 3 Prime Locations for Hypnotherapy in Bristol
item.description: 3 Prime Locations for Hypnotherapy in Bristol

item.title: Hypnosis
item.description:
Hypnosis

Why? Because when you are relaxed and calm, Anxiety and Stress does not exist, because you're doing the opposite instead. You simply can't be on high alert, and be on top of your stress bucket stuff at the same time.

item.title: Getting Started
item.description:
Getting Started

It couldn’t be easier.  All you need to do is book an initial consultation.  Liane or Sam will explain in clear text just how the brain works in relation to your issue or desired goal.  But more importantly, you’ll find out how hypnotherapy has helped 1000s of people not only to cope better, but to go on and achieve the most amazing positive lasting changes that brighten up all aspects of their home and work life.

item.title: Liane Ulbricht-Kazan DHP HPD MNCH(Reg) MNCP LAPHP
item.description:
Liane Ulbricht-Kazan DHP HPD MNCH(Reg) MNCP LAPHP

Originally from Germany, Liane has followed many aspects of the positive psychology movement since before she moved to Bristol over 10 years ago.

item.title: Sam Little BA(hons) DSFH
item.description:
Sam Little BA(hons) DSFH

Sam joined Clifton Hypnotherapy Practice in 2015, because it just made good sense.  His training is almost identical to Liane's, but his background and experience is not.  This gives them a solid basis on which to base the services, sessions, and programmes, which they offer, whilst they each have different additional skills to bring to the mix.

item.title: Top 5 Reasons to Choose Clifton Hypnotherapy Practice
item.description:
Top 5 Reasons to Choose Clifton Hypnotherapy Practice

1) In order to get good at anything, it takes practice.  Here at changes welcome we see more client per week then 3/4's of the entire NCH membership.  In short, this means that we get a lot of practice!
